data.title: 45 behind-the-scenes photos of 45 of the best movies of all time
data.meta_description: Stacker compiled behind-the-scenes photos from 45 great movies in film history using data-backed rankings of the 100 best movies of all time.
data.text:
Share this

45 behind-the-scenes photos of 45 of the best movies of all time

Stacker compiled behind-the-scenes photos from 45 great movies in film history using data-backed rankings of the 100 best movies of all time.

Singin' in the Rain (1952)

The Godfather Part II (1974)

The Night of the Hunter (1955)

Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)

Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1964)

La Dolce Vita (1959)

Paths of Glory (1957)

The Third Man (1949)

All About Eve (1950)

Fanny and Alexander (1982)

Double Indemnity (1944)

Citizen Kane (1941)

A Streetcar Named Desire (1951)

Apocalypse Now (1979)

Alien (1979)

Modern Times (1936)

The Godfather (1972)

The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance (1962)
